Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a Democrat, I'm an Independent, but I caucus with the Democrats

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't consider myself a pariah

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, let me be very clear. I supported Barack Obama originally

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: At its worst, Washington is a place where name-calling partisan politics too often trumps policy

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not always a smiley kind of guy

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: Because things are the way they are, things will not stay the way they are

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to rob by setting up a bank than by holding up a bank clerk

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: What a miserable thing life is: you're living in clover, only the clover isn't good enough

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: No one will improve your lot if you do not yourself

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: Hungry man, reach for the book: it is a weapon

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be afraid of death so much as an inadequate life

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: Intelligence is not to make no mistakes, but quickly to see how to make them good

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: Science knows only one commandment - contribute to science

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone chases after happiness, not noticing that happiness is right at their heels

Quote.Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many elements to a campaign. Leadership is number one. Everything else is number two

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the most beautiful daughter in the world and I'm grateful for her

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot show people only the petals and not the thorns. It's not fair to them

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought doing reality TV would be the greatest success of my life or the biggest mistake

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always in my pajamas, unless I know for a fact that people are taking my picture

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to look nice, but I'm not marketing being beautiful

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big bath person

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's be clear, I'm a strong woman

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: I despise shopping and department stores

Quote.Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way I'm interested in having a baby is the old-fashioned way

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd luv to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I have often seen an actor laugh off the stage, but I don't remember ever having seen one weep

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: In this business, until you're known as a monster you're not a star

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: This has always been a motto of mine: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Old age is no place for sissies

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, don't let's ask for the moon. We've already got the stars

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I will not retire while I've still got my legs and my make-up box

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex is God's joke on human beings

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've never been hated by your child, you've never been a parent

Quote.Author: Bette Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just too much

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: You can always tell about somebody by the way they put their hands on an animal

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big cockeyed optimist. I try to accentuate the positive as opposed to the negative

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: Animals are near and dear to my heart, and I've devoted my life to trying to improve their lives

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: I've enjoyed the opposite sex a lot. Always have. Always will

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: Anger tears me up inside... My own... or anyone else's

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: Hot dogs and Red Vines and potato chips and French fries are my favorite foods

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: I think older women still have a full life

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: Animal lover that I am, a cougar I am not

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: I just make it my business to get along with people so I can have fun. It's that simple

Quote.Author: Betty White
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in the acting business. That's the ego business

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't start out writing to give children hope, but I'm glad some of them found it

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a great reader of fairy tales. I tried to read the entire fairy tale section of the library

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I read my books aloud before they were published

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a ballerina. I changed my mind

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: Writers are good at plucking out what they need here and there

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an only child; I didn't have a sister, or sisters

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: What interests me is what children go through while growing up

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a very wise mother. She always kept books that were my grade level in our house

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy writing for third and fourth graders most of all

Quote.Author: Beverly Cleary
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a very observant child. The boys in my books are based on boys in my neighborhood growing up

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is the signature of civilizations

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: I lived through the garbage. I might as well dine on the caviar

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: Attachment to spiritual things is... just as much an attachment as inordinate love of anything else

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: Anger begins with folly, and ends with repentance

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a growing strength in women but it's in the forehead, not the forearm

Quote.Author: Beverly Sills
Quote.QuoteValue: You see why we play so many crazy ladies. We have to be crazy to start with

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel great identification with the developing world

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not supposed to go out and kill all those we suspect to have committed a crime

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who suffer are not those at the top, but are the less privileged members of society

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the only time when we can call for intervention is when there is an ongoing genocide

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Governments are mandated by international law to protect people from genocide

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: The killing of innocent people is always wrong

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, we talk a lot about terrorism, but we rarely talk about state terrorism

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: The Sandinista revolution was without any question a popular insurrection

Quote.Author: Bianca Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Live interviews are more difficult to distort

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: I think gold is made for kings and pharaohs - that's what I am

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: I get sick all the time because I get no rest and sleep, but it's definitely worth it

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: There's definitely a thin line between being tasteful and tacky

Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to make the soundtrack of people's lives

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: I never look at it like I'm wasting money when I'm buying gold

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I feel like putting on a blazer with just a T-shirt

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though it's tiring, I'm having the time of my life

Quote.QuoteValue: Being in the Midwest, you get the best of all worlds and add your own flavor to it

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: I've definitely stolen a lot of things

Quote.Author: Big Sean
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a real player move to take a girl wine-tasting on a date - she'll like that

Quote.QuoteValue: You go to Starbucks, and you know what you're going to get. It's the same with my yoga

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can, you must

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing in the world can take my peace away from me

Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing wrong with material things as long as you don't lie, cheat and steal

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury
Quote.QuoteValue: Maintaining spirituality and humanism are the keys to success. It's a balance

Quote.QuoteValue: Natural hydration is a key factor in any type of sports performance

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot steal somebody's intellectual property. Law and justice protect

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury
Quote.QuoteValue: Because I'm a sweet, kind guy, everybody thinks I'm an idiot, I'm weak

Quote.Author: Bikram Choudhury
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't suffer, you don't get anything. Nothing easy in life

Quote.QuoteValue: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in

Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better

Quote.QuoteValue: Trying to take money out of politics is like trying to take jumping out of basketball

Quote.Author: Bill Bradley
Quote.QuoteValue: The taste of defeat has a richness of experience all its own

Quote.Author: Bill Bradley
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaders should be collaborative, modest, and generous

Quote.Author: Bill Bradley
Quote.QuoteValue: Becoming number one is easier than remaining number one

Quote.Author: Bill Bradley
Quote.QuoteValue: There has never been a great athlete who died not knowing what pain is

Quote.Author: Bill Bradley
Quote.QuoteValue: When you make speeches you elicit expectations against which you will be held accountable

Quote.Author: Bill Bradley
Quote.QuoteValue: Al Gore clearly has the vision... it's a much better vision than that of George W. Bush

Quote.Author: Bill Bradley
Quote.QuoteValue: All I have are the people

Quote.Author: Bill Bryson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a great believer that you had to do everything you've done to have got to where you are

Quote.Author: Bill Bryson
Quote.QuoteValue: I see litter as part of a long continuum of anti-social behaviour

Quote.Author: Bill Bryson
Quote.QuoteValue: I understand cricket - what's going on, the scoring - but I can't understand why

Quote.Author: Bill Bryson
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from Des Moines. Someone had to

Quote.Author: Bill Bryson
Quote.QuoteValue: More than 300 million people in the world speak English and the rest, it sometimes seems, try to

Quote.QuoteValue: You may find that your parents are the most delightful people, but you don't want to live with them

Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need a science degree to understand about science. You just need to think about it

Quote.Author: Bill Bryson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm definitely an American, because I grew up here. But I've lived very happily in Britain

Quote.QuoteValue: The Iraq war fueled distrust of the press from both sides

Quote.Author: Bill Dedman
Quote.QuoteValue: History is the best guide to the future

Quote.QuoteValue: Spring and summer in Pittsburgh mean outdoor festivals

Quote.QuoteValue: If he is convicted, Dr. Kevorkian says he will die a martyr's death by going on a hunger strike

Quote.Author: Bill Dedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Humidity notwithstanding, summer seems to bring out the best of Cincinnati

Quote.Author: Bill Dedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty much a documents reporter. I'm a public records geek

Quote.Author: Bill Dedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a person who has people tell me things in parking garages

Quote.Author: Bill Dedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not one to seek simple causes

Quote.Author: Bill Dedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not in the what-people-feel business. It is not my place to guess

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny: people who meet me say, 'I thought you'd be different.' But I'm still the same guy

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate stupid people. They should have to wear signs that just say, 'I'm stupid.'

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a blue collar guy

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: I love stand up, but every year, the road takes a little more out of you

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a reason God didn't give me this success in my 20s, because I'd have blown it

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do politics, I don't do religion, I don't do ethnic jokes

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't been really nervous about a gig in a long time

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: It's fun being Bill Engvall

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: Left to my own vices, all I would own is a Corvette, and it would be broken down

Quote.Author: Bill Engvall
Quote.QuoteValue: Europe has such an expansive history

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the comments about me being a shill for leadership are beyond the pale

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: We still have a First Amendment that protects your business and free speech

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: You won't find any volatile quotes out in the press where I've run the team down publicly

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: Going forward, we must continue the fight to change the direction of our country

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: I think what we need to do is to have an immigration system where legal immigration is easier

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't endorse people that bash judges based on his ethnic heritage

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: I was incredibly angry to see Mr. Trump question a judge's motives because of his ethnicity

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to have comprehensive tax reform

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: Washington is out of control, and it's time for Texans to stand up and stop them

Quote.Author: Bill Flores
Quote.QuoteValue: Chet Edwards votes for every bailout and against ending any bailout!

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't have a favorite team

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a believer in karma, and I'm also a believer that things happen for a reason

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You can say I give you this information as a dispassionate observer

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I told my wife, when I go up to the garage and I wash my Cobra, I feel like I'm cheating on her

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The muscles in my lower abdomen had torn off my pelvis

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Do every single thing you can to protect yourself, your family, and your country

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Disrespect is my biggest pet peeve

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm as passionate as any car owner or car collector that has one car or 300 cars

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I host reality shows; the last thing I ever wanted to do was be a contestant on one

Quote.Author: Bill Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The NFL can go to hell

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a total Pink Floyd house

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of incomplete short films and incomplete scripts out there

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: A person being patient with an insane person is my favorite thing in the world

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very close to my sisters

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: Fred Armisen does a pretty good me

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: Every two months, I would get an email, 'Skeleton Twins update: still don't have the money!'

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's face it: I look pretty out of shape

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: I wrote a fan e-mail to Michael Chabon

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: Turns out typecasting is a real thing

Quote.Author: Bill Hader
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember seeing 'Spinal Tap' at a young age and being like, 'That's how you perform comedy.'

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mean to sound bitter, cold, or cruel, but I am, so that's how it comes out

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: Watching television is like taking black spray paint to your third eye

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do drugs anymore... than, say, the average touring funk band

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a heavy smoker any more. I only get through two lighters a day now

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a heavy smoker. I go through two lighters a day

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: We all pay for life with death, so everything in between should be free

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: Your denial is beneath you, and thanks to the use of hallucinogenic drugs, I see through you

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: We are the facilitators of our own creative evolution

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always funny until someone gets hurt. Then it's just hilarious

Quote.Author: Bill Hicks
Quote.QuoteValue: When two or more people agree on an issue, I form on the other side

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always been much better at asking questions than knowing what the answers were

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to feel that I understand little things about sports

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: Do people really believe there's something different about the eyes of murderers?

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: Professionalism in law has brought us the O.J. Simpson case in lieu of justice

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: Famous crime stories almost always lead to the passing of new laws

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: Crime stories show us the part of people's lives they try to keep hidden

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: Crime cases tend to be fascinating until you figure out what happened

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: There are, I believe, many more false confessions to murders than true confessions

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: Computers, like automobiles and airplanes, do only what people tell them to do

Quote.Author: Bill James
Quote.QuoteValue: Serial murders are just the worst stories. It can take an emotional toll on you

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.'

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all been satirized for your protection

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: We have the Bill of Rights. What we need is a Bill of Responsibilities

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Jim Bakker spells his name with two k's because three would be too obvious

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything that used to be a sin is now a disease

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Clinton left the White House with all the class of an XFL halftime show

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids. They're not easy. But there has to be some penalty for sex

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you have it tough, read history books

Quote.Author: Bill Maher
Quote.QuoteValue: Curious people are interesting people; I wonder why that is

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be that guy mumbling into his drink at a bar

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: Movie acting suits me because I only need to be good for ninety seconds at a time

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't think about your errors or failures; otherwise, you'll never do a thing

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: I realized the more fun I had, the more relaxed I was working, the better I worked

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I think that's sort of the American way. And it's also the Polish way, it turns out

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a nut, but not just a nut

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I snore, like when I get really tired

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: And I don't like to work. I only like working when I'm working

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: People say I'm difficult and sometimes that's a badge of honour

Quote.Author: Bill Murray
Quote.QuoteValue: When I work, my first relationship with people is professional

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you find out about the world, the more opportunities there are to laugh at it

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: As you may know, I am a mechanical engineer

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: The information you get from social media is not a substitute for academic discipline at all

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor is everywhere in that there's irony in just about anything a human does

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is the best idea humans have ever had. The more people who embrace that idea, the better

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: Teaching creationism in science class as an alternative to evolution is inappropriate

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the drawbacks of English is you can't spell things by hearing them

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: Evolution is the fundamental idea in all of life science - in all of biology

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: If the Earth gets hit by an asteroid, it's game over. It's control-alt-delete for civilization

Quote.Author: Bill Nye
Quote.QuoteValue: Winter lingered so long in the lap of Spring that it occasioned a great deal of talk

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is contagious. That's why despots fear it so much

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership offers an opportunity to make a difference in someone's life, no matter what the project

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: Actions, not words, are the ultimate results of leadership

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: A strong economy begins with a strong, well-educated workforce

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: If you ask me to compromise on principle, I will get out the veto pen

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans no longer look to government for economic security; rather, they look to their portfolios

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the Patriot Act strikes the right balance needed to protect our freedom and security

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: All the faith and good will in the world is wasted without direction

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: Government frequently has a problem recognizing perception versus reality

Quote.Author: Bill Owens
Quote.QuoteValue: Government can't create wealth, but it can create the conditions for private enterprise to flourish

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't get any medal for trying something, you get medals for results

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've ever won a championship, then that's all you're interested in doing

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: I like linebackers. I collect 'em. You can't have too many good ones

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: You are what you are

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: There is winning and there is misery

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is never final, but failure can be

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're sensitive, you will have a hard time with me

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have fun, fine. It's not all life and death

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: I think confrontation is healthy, because it clears the air very quickly

Quote.Author: Bill Parcells
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really in the excuse business

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality continues to ruin my life

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Weekends don't count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: From now on, I'll connect the dots my own way

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Know what's weird? Day by day, nothing seems to change. But pretty soon, everything's different

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing helps a bad mood like spreading it around

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: When birds burp, it must taste like bugs

Quote.Author: Bill Watterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Why waste time learning, when ignorance is instantaneous?

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always making a comeback but nobody ever tells me where I've been

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody once said we never know what is enough until we know what's more than enough

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on
